sentence.Network_en: It provides the theory basis for isolating chitin from pupa crust Antheraea pernyi.
sentence.Network_cn: 这为制定提取柞蚕蛹几丁质的工艺路线提供了理论依据.

sentence.Network_en: The chitosan extracted from the Antheraea pernyi puparium is a comprehensive utilization product with great value.
sentence.Network_cn: 利用柞蚕蛹壳制取的壳聚糖是柞蚕副产物综合利用的高附加值产品.

sentence.Network_en: Cecropin from Chinese oak silkmoth Antheraea pernyi has a broad spectrum bactericidal effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 柞蚕抗菌肽具有广谱杀菌功能.
